pullRequest.title: Optimized assignGroupsToResource
pullRequest.bodyText:
assignGroupsToResource now sets required attributes to every member just once even though the groups are not disjoint
also added test for this method

nodes.bodyText: I would probably resolve this once, before iterating over the groups. So either attributes are processed for all groups or none of them.

commit.message:
Optimized assignGroupsToResource

- assignGroupsToResource now sets required attributes to every member just once even though the groups are not disjoint
- also added test for this method

Fixes based on review

- emptiness of service is checked only once
- checkGroupIsFromTheSameVoLikeResource used to verify that resource and group are from the same vo
